DOC.brief_summary: This study examine birth control patch 13 cycle ( 1 year ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigating Efficacy Safety Contraceptive Patch 13 Cycles
DOC.criteria: Requiring contraception Normal cervical smear Maximum age smoker 35 History regular cyclic menstrual period Pregnancy lactation Significant skin reaction transdermal preparation sensitivity surgical / medical tape Any disease may worsen hormonal treatment ( cardiovascular , liver , metabolic ) Use contraceptive method study medication
